item.title: How to change shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:3, topic:122312”]for general stores i know how.
search for.

if (server.shopHandler.ShopBModifier[MyShopID] == 1

and under that it has a

TotPrice *= 1.25;

that “1.25” makes the general store make the prices 25% more expensive.

Eg.
if you change the “1.25” to “2.00”
makes the general store sell for the normal price + 100% meaning double normal price.

You can change the shopID to what ever shop you want to change that depends on your server to find that information.

EDIT: Ricky stop giving away FALSE information. shops.java isn’t in most server sources. Meaning he minght not have it so don’t just assume that he has it.[/quote]Please read the rules top flamming my does so his might so STFU

Read full topic

@system wrote:

for general stores i know how.
search for.

if (server.shopHandler.ShopBModifier[MyShopID] == 1

and under that it has a

TotPrice *= 1.25;

that “1.25” makes the general store make the prices 25% more expensive.

Eg.
if you change the “1.25” to “2.00”
makes the general store sell for the normal price + 100% meaning double normal price.

You can change the shopID to what ever shop you want to change that depends on your server to find that information.

EDIT: Ricky stop giving away FALSE information. shops.java isn’t in most server sources. Meaning he minght not have it so don’t just assume that he has it.
